metadata.description: Multi-tentacled orchestration plugin for Claude Code

plugins.name: claude-octopus
plugins.description: v8.19.0 - 8 Veritas-inspired features: configurable quality gates, observation importance, error learning, heartbeat & dynamic timeout, cross-model review (4x10), agent routing rules, tool policy RBAC, crash-recovery. 31 personas, 44 commands, 46 skills. Run /octo:setup.
